title: Jellyfish Nami Skin Concpet

embed.description: this is something i've been fiddling with in my free time, decided to push it to "finish" tonight just so it's not sitting around anymore fan skin concept for nami from the game league of legends! ...

replies.body:
I....I....yes. 

Nami is my go-to support, and this is absolutely gorgeous. I love the color scheme, and how she's transformed into a different kind of sea creature, as opposed to another kind of fish.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=WrQ8uAof,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2015-08-19T17:20:34.708+0000)
>
> I....I....yes. 
> 
> Nami is my go-to support, and this is absolutely gorgeous. I love the color scheme, and how she's transformed into a different kind of sea creature, as opposed to another kind of fish.

thank you for the support, Katey! c:

Great idea and I could see it making an amazing skin.  But that's kind of poor execution of the concept, either she needs to look like an anthropomorphized jelly fish, or the seam between her humanoid and jellyfish parts needs to mesh better.  Right now, she looks like two creatures poorly sewn together by an unskilled taxidermist, that seam between the human and jellyfish halves is just plain ugly.

This is a cool idea. But I think it looks less like she is a jellyfish, and more like her torso is attached to one. I'd want to see a smoother transition. Maybe move the jellyfish body to the top of her head, so it could be better integrated.
They've already discussed this and apparently it just isn't popular right now.

maybe, but good luck with that lol i just been here long enough to see this concept and too many others just like it be suggested and it just hasn't gotten vary far.I think maybe people just don't like nami very much. -shrugs-

> [{quoted}](name=Zamrayz,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=WrQ8uAof,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-08-19T01:38:07.846+0000)
>
> maybe, but good luck with that lol i just been here long enough to see this concept and too many others just like it be suggested and it just hasn't gotten vary far.I think maybe people just don't like nami very much. -shrugs-

im sure that if they were to do this they would stray from how it looks a tiny bit and make it look better with the concept, etc,.

How is "what's popular" determined? 
Or is that just your own opinion on the skin? (Not saying you HAVE to like it) It's just that bias is a thing. 
Personally I'd love to see this in game :3

> [{quoted}](name=MrWasjig,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=WrQ8uAof,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2015-08-19T10:00:23.089+0000)

> Or is that just your own opinion on the skin? (Not saying you HAVE to like it) It's just that bias is a thing.

things that get more attention on it are obviously going to get more attention and be noticed by people that actually make stuff happen when it comes to league.

So glad at least the person who made the thread understands my opinion and doesn't hold it against me. Haha. I never said i didn't like the concept either. In fact i always considered making my own version for her but never got to it. Im lazy like that. But as i fear the comments leading further down below is where i got my doubting speculation from for the post to begin with. But surprisingly it got lots of up-votes where compared to my threads i get absolutely ignored. I envy.

have my up vote
Commenting to upvote, this is so awesome.
i'd totally hit that.
The skins I've seen people create for Nami are amazing. Meanwhile, Riot has yet to make an amazing one for her...{{item:3070}}

> [{quoted}](name=Ace of Eden,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=WrQ8uAof,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2015-08-20T00:13:21.036+0000)
>
> The skins I've seen people create for Nami are amazing. Meanwhile, Riot has yet to make an amazing one for her...{{item:3070}}

the stuff done for her isn't *that* bad, i personally love her eyes in Urf the Nami-tee however i dislike how it looks in game.

always love making fun of the golden spatula, though.

Never said her current skins were bad, just not amazing. I've seen very dark and creepy ones, like angler fish, octopus, jellyfish, etc.
http://lolskinconcepts.com/jellyfish-nami/
http://lolskinconcepts.com/spectral-reaper-nami/
http://lolskinconcepts.com/sea-witch-nami/

These are some of my favorites.

those are all qt, it's another jellyfish nami. i honestly think i love the color scheme of the one i linked, rather than the one you did, because purple is one of my favorite colors and it goes with orange well.

i also like the little glow it has.. > u <

The only thing that weirds me out is how the chest-flesh fans out to reveal boobs underneath, reminds me a lot of her regular artwork, where her scales are peeling back to reveal breasts, it looks nasty right there!

> [{quoted}](name=Kiwi Disu,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=WrQ8uAof,comment-id=000d,timestamp=2015-08-20T00:31:32.426+0000)
>
> The only thing that weirds me out is how the chest-flesh fans out to reveal boobs underneath, reminds me a lot of her regular artwork, where her scales are peeling back to reveal breasts, it looks nasty right there!

i honestly didn't focus on the chest until you said that.

even still, it doesn't look THAT bad, 

if they were to add it into the game im sure they would do that part better.

i honestly think it looks fine, doesn't really bother me as much.

however, i can understand where you are coming from. im sure that if they were to add that into the game,

it would *hopefully* suite you better. maybe it's just how the artist that currently drew the concept did it.
This would be so cool as a skin and it would actually make her look different. I would buy it.
I'm throwing my money at the screen, but nothing is happening. Do I have to break my screen to get it?
its cool? (personally i really really really am creeped out by jellyfish) Still hoping for that sea witch nami tho
It's pretty cool, I do like the colors. But, Ive still got my fingers crossed for the Sea Witch Nami skin. xD
This looks like an absolutely fantastic model

I think a lot of people would love this idea, especially Nami players. So many people think jellyfish are cute, and it works pretty well with her. **It's important that people remember, concepts are just that, they are in no way the final product.** It's extremely unlikely that the skin would look the picture, and Riot would probably stray from the concept artwork quite a bit. I personally would prefer a Jellyfish Nami with lighter and more translucent colors.

However I don't think she's due for a new skin until next year since her last one was just a couple of months ago.
